items.text: UK MINISTRY OF DEFENCE intel suggests RUSSIA increasingly recruiting foreign mercenaries/fighters to offset significant personnel losses in UKRAINE conflict - high casualty rates forcing military recruitment strategy shift (Bloomberg)

US SPACE FORCE to launch 2026 commercial satellite competition focusing on on-orbit maneuvering capabilities — critical technology for military space resilience and potential anti-satellite defense (Air & Space Forces Magazine)

U.S. ARMY soliciting advanced counter-drone technologies to mitigate growing aerial reconnaissance and potential weaponized drone risks - seeking solutions to neutralize small UAS threats without kinetic destruction (New Indian Express)
IRAN faces global protest wave — 100,000+ demonstrators across 5 cities mark 1-year anniversary of Mahsa Amini death, largest international solidarity rallies since 2022 uprising (BBC)
LATVIA intelligence chief warns RUSSIA likely to maintain military mobilization infrastructure post-UKRAINE conflict - signals potential long-term regional security threat (Kyiv Post)
INDONESIA prepares 8,000 troops for potential GAZA peacekeeping mission by JUNE - first Muslim-majority nation signaling direct military humanitarian intervention (AP)
UKRAINE detains former energy minister GERMAN GALUSHCHENKO on corruption charges - linked to high-profile MINICH case, attempted to flee country (TASS)
ISRAEL conducts military operations in GAZA - 9 Palestinians killed in targeted strike; simultaneous cross-border engagement into LEBANON's southern region (Al Jazeera)
ISRAEL defense intelligence warns of potential TURKEY, EGYPT nuclear program development - requires active monitoring by national security apparatus (Ynetnews)
POLAND signals potential NUCLEAR WEAPONS program development — direct response to RUSSIA threat, exploring independent deterrence strategy outside NATO nuclear umbrella (UNN)

ISRAEL cabinet approves plan to register significant West Bank territories as STATE PROPERTY — potential major escalation in territorial dispute with PALESTINIAN AUTHORITY. Move could enable further settlement expansion in contested zones (Al Jazeera)
EUROPEAN investigators conclude NAVALNY killed via dart frog neurotoxin - assassination likely ordered by KREMLIN; direct evidence of state-sponsored poisoning implicates PUTIN regime (Al Jazeera)
ISRAEL conducts military operations in GAZA — 10 Palestinians killed in 24-hour period, UN SECURITY COUNCIL monitoring situation (Al Jazeera)
GOOGLE THREAT ANALYSIS: State-sponsored cyber actors targeting DEFENCE sector employees with targeted digital intrusion campaign — specific nation-state actors not yet confirmed (The Guardian)

PENTAGON faces critical drone defense vulnerabilities - CNAS report reveals systemic gaps in counter-UAS capabilities, warns of potential strategic weakness against RUSSIA, CHINA drone technologies (Center for New American Security)

SUDAN conflict: African Union intensifies diplomatic efforts to broker ceasefire between SUDAN ARMED FORCES and RAPID SUPPORT FORCES — multiple regional leaders engaging in mediation talks (Sudan Horizon)

US MILITARY preparing for potential extended operations against IRAN in region - multiple carrier strike groups positioned, strategic assets mobilized. Significant escalation signals imminent confrontation potential (Daily Sabah)
ISRAEL launches targeted airstrikes in GAZA - 11 Palestinians killed after alleged HAMAS truce violation; IDF confirms precision strikes against militant infrastructure (Reuters)
GAZA: MILITANTS force DOCTORS WITHOUT BORDERS (MSF) to suspend operations at NASSER HOSPITAL — critical medical infrastructure disrupted amid ongoing conflict (Al Jazeera)
NIGERIA: Militants kill 32 civilians in western region — potential BOKO HARAM operation targeting rural communities; multiple hostages taken (TASS)
US NORAD scrambles F-16 interceptors after unauthorized aircraft detected near TRUMP rally location in Florida - potential airspace security breach investigated (Newsweek)

UN reports 6,000+ killed in 3-day RSF assault on EL-FASHER, SUDAN — potential genocide-level civilian casualties in ongoing conflict; worst single urban massacre since war began in April 2023 (NBC News)
ISRAEL strikes GAZA tent camp - 11 confirmed killed by Palestinian Red Crescent in northern sector; escalates ongoing conflict amid intense military operations (BBC)

RUSSIA claims capture of TSVETKOVOYE in UKRAINE's ZAPOROZHYE region - significant tactical advance suggests ongoing offensive operations. RUSSIAN MOD reports substantial UKRAINIAN losses in territorial engagement (TASS)
ISRAEL conducts airstrikes in GAZA - 9 Palestinians killed, including casualties at refugee tent camp; IDF confirms strike targeting HAMAS militants (Reuters)

ISRAEL confirms targeted strike against senior IRGC commanders in DAMASCUS - at least 2 Iranian generals killed, multiple research scientists neutralized in precision operation. Significant escalation in SYRIA shadow war (Time Magazine)
RUSSIA military chief GERASIMOV confirms BATTLEGROUP SOUTH advancing towards SLAVYANSK - active offensive operations in DONBAS region targeting Ukrainian defensive positions (TASS)
MYANMAR military conducts airstrikes in KARENNI state - targeting civilian resistance areas with significant escalation of regional conflict (The Diplomat)
NORTH KOREA providing tactical support to RUSSIA in UKRAINE conflict - military drones and electronic warfare capabilities confirmed by Ukrainian intelligence services (Ukrinform)
IDF conducts precision strike against HEZBOLLAH weapons facilities in LEBANON - multiple rocket launchers destroyed, targeting militant infrastructure near border region (JNS)
